headline: Martin Marietta Materials (NYSE:MLM) Declares US$0.79 Cash Dividend for Q2 2025
summary: Martin Marietta Materials (NYSE:MLM) recently affirmed its quarterly dividend, maintaining a payout of $0.79 per share, and declared intentions for value-enhancing acquisitions, which might have supported its 11% share price increase over the past month. Recent earnings showed increased sales, but net income and EPS declined significantly from the previous year. Additionally, the company repurchased a significant number of shares, further bolstering shareholder value. While these...
